title: Project Katarina Missing SFX on live
body:
So I've been playing Project Kat all day since it was released and I noticed she didn't say "Blood for Noxus!" once in any of the games I played

I figured it was just a bug so I went to test it in a custom match and it turns out she doesn't say any of her attack quotes? Sat there for like 10 minutes just auto attacking minions to double check and I didn't get a peep out of her besides her movement quotes :/

Can someone look into this please! 

( [reference for her quotes](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Katarina)  ) )

replies.body:
Hey Pow Pow,

Thanks for the report! 

I just took a look at her in game as well, and I was only able to trigger "*Is that fear I smell?"*.  Lemme sync up with an audio engineer and see what's going on here.
